title: Havana/Smooth
lyrics:
[intro] | (Gm)  (Eb) | (D) (Hey!) (D) |  x2
[Havana chorus]
Ha(Gm)vana, ooh na-(Eb)na (D) (ayy)
Half of my heart is in Ha(Gm)vana, ooh-na-(Eb)na (D) (ayy, ayy)
He took me back to East A(Gm)tlanta, na-na-(Eb)na (D)
All of my heart is in Ha(Gm)vana (ayy), there's (Eb)somethin' 'bout his (D)manners (uh huh)
Havana, ooh na-(Gm)na (uh)
 
[start straight away]
He (Gm)didn't walk up with that (Eb)"how you doin'?" (uh) (D) (When he came in the room)
He (Gm)said there’s a lot of girls (Eb)I can do with (uh)  (D) (But I can't without you)
I'm (Gm)doin' forever (Eb)in a minute (hey) (D) (That summer night in June)
And (Gm)papa says he got (Eb)malo in him (uh) (D)
 
He got me feelin' like (Gm)oooh-(Eb)oooh-(D)ooh
I knew it when I (Gm)met him, I (Eb)loved him when I (D)left him
Got me feelin' like (Gm)oooh-(Eb)oooh-(D)ooh
And then I had to (Gm)tell him
I (Eb)had to go (D-stop) oh na-na-na-na-na
[Havana chorus]
Ha(Gm)vana, ooh na-(Eb)na (D) (ayy)
Half of my heart is in Ha(Gm)vana, ooh-na-(Eb)na (D) (ayy, ayy)
He took me back to East A(Gm)tlanta, na-na-(Eb)na (D)
All of my heart is in Ha(Gm)vana (ayy), there's (Eb)somethin' 'bout his (D)manners (uh huh)
Havana, ooh na-(Gm)na (uh) [start Smooth chorus straight away]
[Smooth chorus]
And well it’s (Gm)just like the (Eb)ocean (D)under the moon
Well that's the (Gm)same as the e(Eb)motion that I (D)get from you
You (Gm)got the kind of (Eb)lovin that can (D)be so smooth
[single strum] (Eb)Gimme your heart, (Eb)make it (D)real, (N/C) or else forget about it
[Havana chorus]
Ha(Gm)vana, ooh na-(Eb)na (D) (ayy)
Half of my heart is in Ha(Gm)vana, ooh-na-(Eb)na (D) (ayy, ayy)
He took me back to East A(Gm)tlanta, na-na-(Eb)na (D)
All of my heart is in Ha(Gm)vana (ayy), there's (Eb)somethin' 'bout his (D)manners (uh huh)
Havana, ooh na-(Gm)na (uh)
[interlude - kazoo] | (Gm)  (Eb) | (D)  (D) |  x4
 
[Smooth chorus - with Havana Ooh’s til the end]
And well it’s (Gm)just like the (Eb)ocean (D)under the moon
Well that's the (Gm)same as the e(Eb)motion that I (D)get from you
You (Gm)got the kind of (Eb)lovin that can (D)be so smooth
[single strum] (Eb)Gimme your heart, (Eb)make it (D)real, (N/C) or else forget about it
 
[Havana chorus]
Ha(Gm)vana, ooh na-(Eb)na (D) (ayy)
Half of my heart is in Ha(Gm)vana, ooh-na-(Eb)na (D) (ayy, ayy)
He took me back to East A(Gm)tlanta, na-na-(Eb)na (D)
All of my heart is in Ha(Gm)vana (ayy), there's (Eb)somethin' 'bout his (D)manners (uh huh)
Havana, ooh na-(Gm)na (uh)
(Gm)Gimme your (Eb)heart, make it (D)real (or else forget about it)  x3
Ha(Gm)vana, there's (Eb)somethin' 'bout his (D)manners (uh huh)
[slower] Havana, ooh.. na...(Gm-single strum)na [end]
